Hi, Naman. Thank you.
For the J.P. Morgan, Glasgow opportunity, I directly applied on their careers page when there was a job opening. After that, it was a usual process like any other company.
Ok and if you are not taking that role can you please divert them to me if possible, its a huge huge request
